attributes.action: introduce prison rooms for disruptive school  pupils
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To introduce prison rooms within the school for disruptive school  pupils . That all furniture etc are stripped from a reasonably sized room and that disruptive pupils are monitored in this room by CCTV cameras and by paid state type security guards . That the length of time a pupil has to be kept in this locked type prison room is dependant upon the gravity of their offences and is assessed by a panel at the school . That only bread and water is given to these pupils at lunchtime and that  there has to be no seating except for the floor .That the minimium period that disruptive pupils have to be held in these rooms is 5 hours and that handcuffs leg restraints are to be used for pupils who become violent in these prison rooms within secondary schools  .
